allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix: Add defensive check for sqlite_manager attribute in REPL

Prevents AttributeError crash on REPL startup when RuntimeManager
doesn''t have sqlite_manager attribute. Uses hasattr() to gracefully
handle missing attribute.

Location: runtime/repl.py line 112 in _display_latest_meta_reflection()

Error Fixed:
  AttributeError: ''RuntimeManager'' object has no attribute ''sqlite_manager''

Change:
  - Before: if not self.runtime.sqlite_manager:
  + After: if not hasattr(self.runtime, ''sqlite_manager'') or not self.runtime.sqlite_manager:

This allows the REPL to start successfully even when sqlite_manager
is not initialized on RuntimeManager.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
